text: hi everybody I'm Alicia from English

class 101.com
do you know how Americans celebrate New

Year's Day in this lesson you'll learn
some important phrases about American

New Year's and some valuable cultural
tips

in English the first day of the year is
called New Year's Day New Year's Day

during this day almost everyone gets a
day off from work closed stores gas

stations and other businesses are common
sights on January 1st in the u.s. the

largest parties in the nation are
celebrated the night before so Americans
tend to take it easy on this day

on New Year's Day we greet each other by
saying Happy New Year Happy New Year

on the other hand when you meet a group
of people on New Year's Day you can say

Happy New Year everyone happy new year
everyone

Americans also celebrate the holiday
with special events and customs the most

popular one is New Year's resolutions
New Year's resolutions it's a promise

that a person makes to do something new
such as a healthy activity it could also

be to stop or give up a bad habit and
it's often a lifestyle change New Year's

resolutions are popular in the United
States though often not really seriously

followed most of the time people will
promise to give up a bad habit or start

a healthy new habit over the course of
the new year popular resolutions include

quitting smoking losing weight becoming
more ambitious with goals and getting a
better job

on this special day American people also
have a New Year's party New Year's party

it's a party either at home or at a bar
with friends and family people countdown

the last seconds of the old year and
welcome the new one one of the biggest

celebrations in the nation is held in
Times Square in New York this is

typically regarded as the official New
Year party for the entire country though

each timezone rings in the New Year with
its own celebration

let's wrap up this lesson by recapping
what you've learned listen to the phrase
and repeat after me New Year's Day
New Year's Day Happy New Year
happy new year new year's resolutions
New Year's resolutions New Year's party

New Year's party well done you just
learned how Americans celebrate New

Year's Day and some important facts
about the holiday and if you really want

to become fluent and speak English from
the very first lesson go to English

class 101.com
I'll see you next time bye
